00035 uint8_t QHsm::isIn(QStateHandler state) {
00036     QStateHandler s = m_state;
00037     QState r;
00038     uint8_t inState = (uint8_t)0;    // assume that this HSM is not in 'state'
00039     do {
00040         if (m_state == state) {                        // do the states match?
00041             inState = (uint8_t)1;                  // match found, return TRUE
00042             r = Q_RET_IGNORED;                        // break out of the loop
00043         }
00044         else {
00045             r = QEP_TRIG_(m_state, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);
00046         }
00047     } while (r != Q_RET_IGNORED);                // QHsm_top state not reached
00048     m_state = s;                                 // restore the original state
00049     return inState;                                       // return the status
00050 }
